description: Official police complaint documenting the criminal incident with date time and details
storage_requirements: Keep certified copy with acknowledgement number, maintain digital scan

description: Medical documentation of injuries or physical harm from government or registered hospital
storage_requirements: Obtain from government hospital, keep original sealed in envelope
